sentences.en: Changing her job like that is equivalent to giving her the sack.
sentences.cn: 那样调换她的工作等于是解雇她.

sentences.en: Don't stuff the sack too full or it'll burst.
sentences.cn: 别装得太多,把口袋撑破了.

sentences.en: Francis bundled up her clothes again into their small sack.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西丝再次把她的衣服塞进了他们的小袋子里。

sentences.en: he drags me in like a sack of potatoes.
sentences.cn: 他粗手粗脚地把我拉了进去。

sentences.en: He got the sack for stealing.
sentences.cn: 他因偷东西而被解雇。

sentences.en: He hefted a sack of wheat to see how heavy it was.
sentences.cn: 他举起一袋麦子看看有多重.

sentences.en: He pre-empted any decision to sack him.
sentences.cn: 他预先阻止了所有解雇他的决定。

sentences.en: He wants the power to sack incompetent teachers.
sentences.cn: 他想取得解雇不称职老师的权力。

sentences.en: How much did we sack up this time?
sentences.cn: 这次我们获得多少利润?

sentences.en: If you're late again tomorrow, you'll get the sack!
sentences.cn: 如果你明天再迟到, 那就卷铺盖走吧!

sentences.en: Other industries have had to sack managers to reduce administrative costs.
sentences.cn: 其他行业只得精简管理人员以减少行政开支。

sentences.en: People who make mistakes can be given the sack the same day.
sentences.cn: 一犯错误可能当天就会被开除。

sentences.en: She claimed she’d been threatened with the sack.
sentences.cn: 她称自己受到过解雇的威胁。

sentences.en: The manager had found him out and was going to sack him.
sentences.cn: 经理发觉了他的不轨行为,打算炒他鱿鱼.

sentences.en: The poor old sod got the sack yesterday.
sentences.cn: 那位可怜的老兄昨天给解雇了。

sentences.en: They couldn’t sack me – I’d done nothing wrong.
sentences.cn: 他们不能解雇我——我没做错什么事。

sentences.en: They made him pay for his offence by giving him the sack.
sentences.cn: 他们解雇了他,从而使他因自己的过错而受到了惩罚.

sentences.en: They’ve never actually given anyone the sack .
sentences.cn: 他们从未真的辞退过什么人。

sentences.cn: 这 包米 给鼠啮虫咬了.
